dct_title_s: Description geographique de la Terre Promise
dct_description_sm: Guilaume Desprez et Jean Desessartz ; dress√© pour la lecture de l'ecriture sainte par le Sr. Moullart-Sanson.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Pas geometriqes" and "Stades".
Decorative cartouche with illustrations of cherubs and Israelites.
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Appears in Guillaume Desprez et Jean Desessartz's La Sainte Bible en latin et francois. Paris, 1717.
